thread.title: very tall opposite yahoo
thread.title_full: very tall opposite yahoo - Review of Hilton Times Square, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: VINCENTNEWDELHI
title: very tall opposite yahoo
text:
The hotel is placed in the middle of busy Manhattan just next to Madame Tussaud's, The hotel resident floor starts from 15th floor and the floor I stayed was 19 bang opposite yahoo building with magnificent view of Manhattan tall sky scrapers.
Room Tip: choose room beyond 20th Floor See more room tips
